articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits New Aquatic Products Refrigerating Facilities
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits New Aquatic Products Refrigerating Facilities
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, visited the Aquatic Products Refrigerating Facilities newly built by KPA Unit 534.
					 He went round various refrigerating facilities to learn in detail about their construction and the refrigeration of aquatic products.
					
					 He highly praised the unit for building a breakwater and very large modern refrigerating facilities with a wharf in a brief span of time.
					
					 The fisheries field of the People's Army made big fish hauls last year, he said, adding that it should continue to take the lead in fishing in the future, too.
					
					 He underscored the need to make the flames of the innovation drive in the fisheries field of the People's Army rage furiously in the fisheries across the country.
					
					 He said he visited there to discuss the possibility of supplying fishes to the baby homes, orphanages, orphans' primary and secondary schools and old folks' homes across the country, adding it is a firm resolution and will of the Party to make all children there stoutly grow up free from sorrow over being orphans to become successors to the revolution and backbone of the revolution.
					
					 He personally calculated in a memo what quantities of fishes are required yearly to provide 300 grams of fish to each of them a day.
					
					 Noting that the slogan "Let the People's Army take charge of both national defence and socialist construction!" is very good, he called on the People's Army to carry out the task of supplying fishes to the baby homes, orphanages, orphans' primary and secondary schools and old folks' homes all the year round. 
					
					 He issued on the spot an order of the supreme commander of the KPA to the KPA to set up a fisheries station which will specialize in supplying fishes to the above-said baby homes, orphanages, schools and homes.
					
					 He gave an instruction to finish the construction of the fisheries station before the Day of the Sun and start the fish supply from coming autumn.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that all commanding officers and officials would make big fish hauls this year wherever they work.
					
					 Accompanying him were Choe Ryong Hae, So Hong Chan, Pak Jong Chon, Jo Nam Jin, Hwang Pyong So and Kim Pyong Ho.

articles.title: Meetings Held to Vow to Implement Tasks Set Forth in Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
articles.content:
Meetings Held to Vow to Implement Tasks Set Forth in Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in North Phyongan, South and North Hwanghae, Jagang and Ryanggang provinces Monday and Tuesday to thoroughly carry out the important tasks supreme leader Kim Jong Un set forth in his New Year Address.
					 Present there were officials of local party, power and economic organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities, working people, youth and students.
					
					 Reports and speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 Reporters and speakers underscored the need to glorify this as a year of grandiose struggle, a year of sea changes by devotedly implementing the important tasks set forth in the historic New Year Address of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They called upon the officials and people in the agricultural field to bring about a decisive turn in agricultural production this significant year marking the 50th anniversary of the Theses on the Socialist Rural Question made public by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They stressed the need to launch in a bold and big way the work for realizing the party's grand construction plan and ensure the quality of structures on the highest level by displaying the patriotic devotion.
					
					 They underlined the need to direct efforts to the development of science and technology, achieve scientific and technological successes needed for the economic development of the country and the improved people's living standard, make the climate of attaching importance to science and technology prevail in society and accelerate the work of making all the people well versed in science and technology.
					
					 They said that factories and enterprises should put production processes on a modern basis, increase the production by tapping all potentials and latent reserves and decisively improve the economic guidance and management.
					
					 They also stressed the need to thoroughly establish the traits of attaching importance to the military affairs, sincerely assist the People's Army, strengthen the army-people great unity in every way and thus resolutely foil any provocation of the enemies for aggression and defend the country.

articles.title: Meetings Held in Response to New Year Address of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Meetings Held in Response to New Year Address of Kim Jong Un
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Young people, agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) in their meetings Tuesday vowed to thoroughly implement the important tasks set forth in the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Present there were Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), officials of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the UAWK, other officials concerned, youth and students, agricultural workers and members of the UAWK. 
					
					 The meeting of young people was held at the Youth Park Open-Air Theatre.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, addressed the meeting to be followed by speeches.
					
					 They called on all the young people to fully display their heroic spirit as the young vanguard living in the era of Songun in the on-going worthwhile drive to translate the beautiful ideal and dreams of people into reality.
					
					 They underscored the need for the young people in the field of agriculture to make contributions to attaining the goal of grain production set by the WPK without fail in this significant year by playing a pioneer's role in bringing about a signal boost in agricultural production.
					
					 They called on the young people to devote themselves to building up Pyongyang into a more magnificent city and sprucing up their hometowns, villages and worksites.
					
					 They also called on them to live a worthy life with arms and earnestly learn military science and technology so that they may wipe out aggressors at one blow once an order is issued by supreme commander Kim Jong Un and thus accomplish the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 The meeting of agricultural workers and UAWK members was held at the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City.  Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the UAWK, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 They pledged to bring about a revolutionary turn in the agricultural production in this significant year marking the 50th anniversary of the Theses on the Socialist Rural Question, true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Hamhung Water Park Goes Operational
articles.content:
Hamhung Water Park Goes Operational
 Hamhung, January 7 (KCNA) -- A water park has been successfully built in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province.
					 The water park covers tens of thousands of square meters on the bank of the River Songchon. It has a slide tower, several slides, indoor swimming pool, indoor wading pool and service, amusement and sports facilities.
					
					 The appearance of the water park will contribute to the cultural and emotional life of the workers and other people including schoolchildren in the city.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony took place on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, service personnel who participated in the construction of the water park and other builders and their helpers.

articles.title: Schoolchildren's New Year Performance Continues in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Schoolchildren's New Year Performance Continues in Pyongyang 
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren's New Year performance "May You Have Bright Future" is now going on at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace here.
					 Among the colorful numbers highly acclaimed by the audience is "Blessing of the Sun" staged by schoolchildren blessed by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Especially, a story by Kim Mok Ran, who is living on Wolnae Islet, one of the biggest hotspots in the southernmost part, touched the audience to their hearts. In June Juche 102 (2013), she took part in and made a speech at the 7th Congress of the Korean Children's Union held in presence of Kim Jong Un before having a photo session with him.
					
					 Later, when visiting the Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment, Kim Jong Un recognized her among cheering service personnel and their family members.
					
					 Patting her on the back, he praised her for making a good speech at the congress and wished her happy future.
					
					 At the performance, she said with deep emotion that the rosy future for all the schoolchildren of the country would be unthinkable without the loving care of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Best Players, Coaches for 2013
articles.content:
DPRK's Best Players, Coaches for 2013 
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The list of 10 best players and 10 best coaches of the DPRK for Juche 102 (2013) is as follows:
					 
					
					 Best players
					
					 1. Om Yun Chol, male weightlifter of the Amnokgang Sports Team
					
					Three gold medals in the 2013 Asian Cup and Interclub Junior and Senior Weightlifting Championship, with new world record in the jerk event
					
					 Three golds in the 2013 Asian Weightlifting Championship
					
					 Two golds and one silver in the 2013 World Weightlifting Championship 
					
					 2. Kim Jong, female table-tennis player of the April 25 Sports Team
					
					 Winner in the mixed doubles of the 52nd ITTF World Championships (individual events) and in the mixed doubles of the 6th East Asian Games
					
					 3. Ryo Un Hui, female weightlifter of the Kigwancha Sports Team
					
					 Three golds in the 2013 Asian Weightlifting Championship
					
					 Two silvers and one bronze in the 2013 World Weightlifting Championship
					
					 4. Ryang Chun Hwa, female weightlifter of the April 25 Sports Team
					
					 Three golds in the 2013 Asian Weightlifting Championship
					
					 Two golds and one silver in the 2013 Asian Cup and Interclub Junior and Senior Weightlifting Championship
					
					 Three silvers in the 2013 World Weightlifting Championship
					
					 5. Kim Hyok Bong, male table-tennis player of the April 25 Sports Team
					
					 Winner in the mixed doubles of the 52nd ITTF World Championships (individual events) and in the mixed doubles of the 6th East Asian Games
					
					 6. Ho Un Pyol, female footballer of the April 25 Sports Team
					
					 Key player in making the DPRK team finish first at the 2013 East Asian Cup and the 6th East Asian Games
					
					 7. Kim Un Guk, male weightlifter of the April 25 Sports Team
					
					 Three golds in the 2013 Asian Weightlifting Championship
					
					 One gold and one silver in the 2013 World Weightlifting Championship
					
					 8. Jo Pok Hyang, female weightlifter of the Kigwancha Sports Team
					
					 Two silvers and one bronze in the 2013 Asian Weightlifting Championship
					
					 Three golds in the 2013 Asian Cup and Interclub Junior and Senior Weightlifting Championship
					
					 Three silvers in the 2013 World Weightlifting Championship
					
					 9. Yun Won Chol, male greco-roman wrestler of the April 25 Sports Team
					
					 One gold in the World Wrestling Championship
					
					 One gold in the 28th World Military Wrestling Championship
					
					 10. Sol Kyong, female judoist of the sports team of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering
					
					 One gold in the 2013 World Judo Championship
					
					 
					
					Best coaches:
					
					 Ro Hyon Chol (weightlifting)
					
					 Kim Chun Hui (weightlifting)
					
					 Kim Yong Chol (weightlifting)
					
					 Choe Nong Gyun (weightlifting)
					
					 Kim Chol Ung (table-tennis)
					
					 Kim Kwang Min (football)
					
					 Pak Ki Song (weightlifting)
					
					 Pak Pom Su (wrestling)
					
					 Pak Kum Song (judo)
					
					 Kim Chun Phil (gymnastics)

articles.title: New Year's Production on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
New Year's Production on Increase in DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the New Year Address given by Marshal Kim Jong Un, officials and workers of different economic sectors have made big efforts to boost  production from the beginning of this year.
					 Officials and workers in the field of agriculture produced hundreds of thousands tons of organic fertilizer as part of full preparations for this year's farming.
					
					 The Chollima Steel Complex has steadily increased steel production. And workers in various units of the complex, including the Posan Iron Works and ferroalloy shop, are keeping equipment in full operation, thus supplying on a regular basis raw and other materials needed for steel production.
					
					 The production is also going up at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex.
					
					 The Musan Mining Complex successfully blasted 350 000 cubic meters of earth in an effort to provide iron and steel mills with more concentrated ore.
					
					 Pyongyang, Kaechon, Hamhung, Chongjin, Rason and other railway bureaus overfulfilled their quota for the New Year's Day at 104.8 percent.
					
					 The daily coal output of the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine is 1.5 times higher than the same period of last year.
					
					 The employees of the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill topped their first workday's plan at 130 percent.
					
					 Blastings of 70 000 and 30 000 cubic meters of earth were successfully carried out in North Phyongan Province by its provincial tideland reclamation complex.
					
					 Meanwhile, people in South Hwanghae Province are pushing forward with the construction of a waterway project.

articles.title: Korean People Make History of Advance by Leaps and Bounds
articles.content:
Korean People Make History of Advance by Leaps and Bounds 
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address called for raising a fierce wind of making a fresh leap forward on all fronts of building a thriving country with confidence in victory.
					 Upon receiving his New Year Address, the people of the DPRK are fully determined to make greater achievements this year as they brought about epochal successes last year.
					
					 The present general onward march requires them to bring about a fresh upsurge in all economic sectors. The march is an extension of historical progress of the Korean revolution under the uplifted banner of constant innovation and continued progress.
					
					 The Korean people had made a history of advance by leaps and bounds, creating new speeds of progress in different annals of the revolution.
					
					 They built up a socialist industrial nation on this land, which had once been reduced to ashes during the Korean War (1950-1953), by creating the Pyongyang Speed, Vinalon Speed and Chollima Speed after the war.
					
					 In the 1970s, they created the new Chollima Speed in order to achieve a rapid growth of national economy, unprecedented in the history of the world industry. And they ushered in a heyday of great socialist construction through the movement for creating the speed of the 1980s.
					
					 Under the energetic guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea and leader Kim Jong Il, they raised fierce winds of fresh advance in the revolutionary soldier spirit and the Kanggye spirit during the Arduous March, the forced march.
					
					 In the spirits of Songgang Torch and Ranam Torch, they made a breakthrough in revitalizing the national economy. The Thaechon Spirit, Kangson Torch, Huichon Speed and Flames lit by South Hamgyong Province served as a driving power to bring about the heyday of national prosperity.
					
					 During the days of creating the "Speed on Masik Pass", especially, they have achieved noteworthy successes in building an economic power and improving the people's standard of living. The construction of monumental edifices in the era of the WPK, including Unha Scientists Street and Munsu Water Park, was a remarkable demonstration of the spirit of the DPRK.
					
					 Now all the service personnel and people of the DPRK are full of patriotic enthusiasm to make fresher and faster upsurge by working miracles and creating a new speed of advance. Thanks to their enthusiasm, a thriving socialist country will surely make its appearance on this land.

articles.title: By Our Nation Itself, Essential for Achieving Korea's Reunification: News Analyst
articles.content:
By Our Nation Itself, Essential for Achieving Korea's Reunification: News Analyst
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The New Year Address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un is instilling stronger aspiration and desire for national reunification into all the fellow countrymen at home and abroad.
					 In the address, he underscored the need to reject foreign forces and hold fast to the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself in order to resolve the reunification issue in keeping with the aspiration and desire of the Korean people. 
					
					 The standpoint of By Our Nation Itself precisely is that towards the principle of national reunification common to the nation. 
					
					 For the Korean nation, there is a principle of national reunification common to the nation, which was already confirmed by the north and the south with full support from all the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The fundamental principle to be maintained and implemented by both of the north and the south is the three principles for national reunification -- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity -- and the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The idea of By Our Nation Itself is the essence of the June 15 joint declaration, which serves as the guidelines for the reunification of the Korean nation in the new century, and the October 4 declaration, the implementation program for the joint declaration. It represents the aspiration and requirement of the entire Korean nation for reunification issue and gives the most scientific answers to theoretical and practical matters in accomplishing the cause of reunification. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address set forth it as an important task for the reunification of the country to reject foreign forces and hold fast to the standpoint of By Nation Itself, which clarifies the essential way to resolve the issue of the destiny of the nation and reunification issue in keeping with the aspiration and desire of the fellow countrymen.
					
					 It belongs to the nation's right to self-determination to solve national issues as desired by the nation.
					
					 It is vital for the Korean nation that has suffered the tragedy of national division forced upon it by outsiders to reject the domination and interference by outsiders and keep the standpoint of independence in solving the national issue, the reunification issue.
					
					 It is illogical to resolve the reunification issue, the issue belonging to the nation's right to self-determination, by leaving it in the hands of outside forces.
					
					 It is an unpardonable act of infringing upon the national sovereignty that the outside forces intervene in the national issue in a bid to reduce the reunification issue to a thing for bargain, as they are seeking their aggressive interests only.
					
					 The Korean nation should hold fast to the principle of independent reunification as its mainstay. Herein lies the basic guarantee for defending the dignity of the nation from the outsiders' interference and successfully accomplishing the cause of national reunification in the common interests of the nation. 
					
					 The principle of independence can never be changed in any case as the north and the south put forward it as the key principle in resolving the reunification issue.
					
					 Its great vitality was clearly manifested through the efforts to implement the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 With the idea of By Our Nation Itself, the Korean people fully displayed their steadfast will to achieve the independent national reunification without any interference of outside forces in the June 15 reunification era.
					
					 The driving force for national reunification is all the members of the Korean nation in the north, in the south and abroad; only when they remain steadfast in this standpoint can they reunify the country independently in line with the nation's interests and demands.
					
					 It is a humiliating treachery of leaving the destiny of the nation in the hands of outside forces to go on a tour around foreign countries touting for "international cooperation" for confrontation with the north in resolving the inter-Korean relations issue, instead of trying to improve the inter-Korean relations by the nation itself.
					
					 The north and the south should uphold the principle of independence, which is one of the three principles for national reunification and has been confirmed in the north-south joint declarations, hold fast to the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself, and respect and implement the declarations with sincerity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Validity of Kim Jong Un's Work on Idea of Juche-based Architecture
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Validity of Kim Jong Un's Work on Idea of Juche-based Architecture
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article says supreme leader Kim Jong Un's letter "Let Us Usher in the Period of Great Prosperity in Construction by Thoroughly Embodying Party's Idea on Juche-based Architecture" is demonstrating great attractive power in the on-going grand drive to open up a new period of prosperity in construction.
					 The work, published on December 8, Juche 102 (2013), says that the construction history of the DPRK is the proud one in which it has brought about miracles and changes thanks to the outstanding idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on architecture and their wise leadership.
					
					 It clarifies the essence of the socialist architecture, the goal and tasks to be fulfilled in the field of construction at present and ways to do so.
					
					 The article deals with the validity and significance of the work:
					
					 The work helps glorify the proud development history and tradition of the Juche-based architecture and indicate the shortcut to bringing about a new revolutionary turn in the field of construction as required by the new century.
					
					 It also indicates the ways to usher in a new period of prosperity in construction by our own efforts and in our own way.
					
					 The article calls upon all the officials and working people to thoroughly embody the idea and theory set forth by Kim Jong Un in his historic letter and thus adorn this as a year of grandiose struggle, a year of sea changes to shine brightly together with the glorious era of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il's Last Instructions for National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il's Last Instructions for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article says that national reunification is the lifetime desire and behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and supreme task of all Koreans.
					 The article praised them as the eternal sun of the nation and lodestar for national reunification who worked heart and soul to the last moments of their lives to bring Koreans a reunified country.
					
					 They laid solid foundations for independent reunification of the country and eternal prosperity of the nation with their outstanding idea and through their energetic leadership, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 These undying feats will shine long in the history of the country.
					
					 The Koreans' efforts to carry out their last instructions for national reunification are the most sacred struggle and a patriotic cause which are bound to emerge victorious.
					
					 It is the firm determination and will of Marshal Kim Jong Un to build on this land the most powerful country in the world by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation free from any interference by outsiders.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north, south and overseas would put into practice the last instructions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for national reunification, remaining true to the patriotic idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Koreans in China Call for Opening New Phase for Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in China Call for Opening New Phase for Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement titled "Let Us Foil Confrontation and War Moves and Open Up New Phase for Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity" on Jan. 5.
					 The idea of national reunification clarified by Marshal Kim Jong Un in the New Year Address commands full support by not only Koreans but the world progressives as it shows a just and realistic way for reunification from the national point of view and in the light of the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It is necessary to create an atmosphere for improving the relations between the north and the south in order to make fresh advance in the movement for national reunification.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop the reckless moves of escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen and the racket of eliminating the "forces following the north". They should lend an ear to the voices of the south Koreans for independence, democracy and reunification and opt for improving the relations with the north.
					
					 The Koreans' cause of national reunification upholding the great idea and intention of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, peerlessly great men, is sure to triumph.
					
					 The cause of national reunification is being led by Marshal Kim Jong Un who is identical to the great Generalissimos.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad are confident of the bright future of a reunified Korea.
					
					 We pledge to achieve unity and solidarity and work hard this year to achieve the great cause of national reunification.
					
					 We will join all other Koreans in their efforts to carry out the tasks set forth in the historic New Year Address.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Vow to Invigorate Patriotic Movement for National Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Vow to Invigorate Patriotic Movement for National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia released a statement on January 3 to vow to thoroughly implement the tasks for national reunification set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Kim Jong Un clearly indicated tasks and ways for bringing about a fresh advance in the movement for national reunification in his New Year Address, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 In order to settle the country's reunification issue as desired and wished by the Koreans, it is essential to reject outsiders and maintain the firm standpoint of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 It is the Korean nation that wishes for the country's reunification and it is also the Koreans who are responsible for the reunification as they are one and the same nation that would live on the reunified territory.
					
					 The reunification issue should be solved by concerted efforts of the Koreans free from outsiders' interference by giving priority to the interests of the nation on the principle of independence.
					
					 But the south Korean conservatives, working as puppets of the U.S. imperialists, rendered the situation on the Korean Peninsula extremely tense while getting hell-bent on the moves to antagonize the fellow countrymen and to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 History proves that dependence on outsiders and confrontation with fellow countrymen will add to the tragedy of national division and sufferings therefrom, offer the outsiders an opportunity to fish in troubled waters and make dark clouds of a nuclear war hover over the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not forget the lesson of history, though belatedly, and opt for improving relations with the DPRK and achieving reconciliation and unity from the stand of putting the nation's interests above all, far from relying on outsiders and staging war drills.
					
					 The Association will invigorate the patriotic movement for reunification to open up a new phase for independent reunification, peace and prosperity in hearty response to the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Denounce S. Korean Regime for Chilling Atmosphere for Improving North-South Ties
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Denounce S. Korean Regime for Chilling Atmosphere for Improving North-South Ties
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia in a statement on January 5 denounced the south Korean authorities for chilling the atmosphere for improving the north-south relations.
					 The statement fully supported and welcomed the New Year Address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un, saying that the address called for firmly preserving the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself, protecting security and peace of the nation and creating the atmosphere for improving the north-south ties.
					
					 But such a dishonest remark as "sincerity" is being heard from south Korea, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Such an act of slandering and antagonizing the fellow countrymen should no longer be tolerated.
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean authorities lend an ear to the Koreans' voices desirous of national reconciliation, co-prosperity and peace, and belatedly opt for improving relations with the north, away from the anachronistic concept of escalating confrontation with the DPRK and far from kowtowing to outsiders.
					
					 We, Koreans in Russia, will conduct more dynamic activities for peace on the Korean Peninsula and reconciliation, unity and reunification of the nation.

articles.title: Korean in Russia Supports S. Koreans' Just Struggle
articles.content:
Korean in Russia Supports S. Koreans' Just Struggle
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Vice-Chairman of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia Ri Chae Son in a statement on Dec. 29 last year supported south Koreans' struggle.
					 The statement expressed towering resentment at the fascist suppression by the south Korean puppet authorities of the workers in their struggle to win the elementary right to existence.
					
					 Calling the protest of broad range of people including workers against the privatization of railway service a just and righteous struggle, the statement went on:
					
					 The puppet authorities reneged on their commitment not to privatize the railway service and cracked down on workers. They set in motion more than 5 000 riot police to go on the rampage, pounding with hammer the entrance door of the headquarters of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, firing tear liquid and walking away at least 130 persons.
					
					 This barbarous act proves that the Park Geun Hye regime is made up of notorious fascists.
					
					 All the Koreans at home and abroad including those in Russia will actively support and encourage the south Koreans in their just struggle to win the right to existence and democracy.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Carried by Mexican Organization in Its Bulletin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Carried by Mexican Organization in Its Bulletin 
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's letter "Let Us Usher in the Period of Great Prosperity in Construction by Thoroughly Embodying Party's Idea on Juche-based Architecture" was carried by the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea in its bulletin on December 30 last year.
					 The letter was sent by him to the participants in the great workshop for officials in the field of construction.
					
					 The work, published on December 8, Juche 102 (2013), says that the construction history of the DPRK is the proud one in which it has brought about miracles and changes thanks to the outstanding idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on architecture and their wise leadership.
					
					 It gives the tasks to be fulfilled in the field of construction and ways to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Organizations of Russia, France
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits New Aquatic Products Refrigerating Facilities
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, visited the Aquatic Products Refrigerating Facilities newly built by KPA Unit 534.
					 He went round various refrigerating facilities to learn in detail about their construction and the refrigeration of aquatic products.
					
					 He highly praised the unit for building a breakwater and very large modern refrigerating facilities with a wharf in a brief span of time.
					
					 The fisheries field of the People's Army made big fish hauls last year, he said, adding that it should continue to take the lead in fishing in the future, too.
					
					 He underscored the need to make the flames of the innovation drive in the fisheries field of the People's Army rage furiously in the fisheries across the country.
					
					 He said he visited there to discuss the possibility of supplying fishes to the baby homes, orphanages, orphans' primary and secondary schools and old folks' homes across the country, adding it is a firm resolution and will of the Party to make all children there stoutly grow up free from sorrow over being orphans to become successors to the revolution and backbone of the revolution.
					
					 He personally calculated in a memo what quantities of fishes are required yearly to provide 300 grams of fish to each of them a day.
					
					 Noting that the slogan "Let the People's Army take charge of both national defence and socialist construction!" is very good, he called on the People's Army to carry out the task of supplying fishes to the baby homes, orphanages, orphans' primary and secondary schools and old folks' homes all the year round. 
					
					 He issued on the spot an order of the supreme commander of the KPA to the KPA to set up a fisheries station which will specialize in supplying fishes to the above-said baby homes, orphanages, schools and homes.
					
					 He gave an instruction to finish the construction of the fisheries station before the Day of the Sun and start the fish supply from coming autumn.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that all commanding officers and officials would make big fish hauls this year wherever they work.
					
					 Accompanying him were Choe Ryong Hae, So Hong Chan, Pak Jong Chon, Jo Nam Jin, Hwang Pyong So and Kim Pyong Ho.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Organizations of Russia, France
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Russian and French organizations released statements on Jan. 1 and 2 in support of the New Year Address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 The National Salvation Front of Russia noted that Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address set forth concrete tasks to expedite socialist construction by thoroughly applying Songun politics, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It supported those tasks set forth in the New Year Address and extended solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to carry out their great historic tasks.
					
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association said that Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address on Jan. 1, 2014 underscored the need to develop the nation's economy and improve the north-south relations. It sent invariable support to the Korean people's struggle for national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre nueva instalacion refrigeradora de productos maritimos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre nueva instalacion refrigeradora de productos maritimos
						
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio la instalacion refrigeradora de productos maritimos recien construida por la unidad 534 del EPC.
					Pasando revista a varios puntos de la instalacion, el Mariscal se entero en detalles del proceso de la construccion y el estado de refrigeracion de productos maritimos.
					
					El Comandante Supremo evaluo altamente el hecho de que la unidad levanto el dique en un corto plazo y construyo una gran moderna instalacion refrigeradora cerca de embarcadero.
					
					Recordo que en el ano pasado la rama pesquera del EPC capturo gran cantidad de peces y anadio que en el futuro tambien el EPC debe estar a la cabeza de la captura de peces.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de avivar tambien en la rama pesquera de todo el pais la llamarada de innovacion iniciada en la misma rama del EPC.
					
					Subrayo que el mismo la visito para debatir la posibilidad de suministro de pescados a hospicios, escuelas primarias y secundarias de huerfanos y asilos de ancianos a lo largo del pais.
					
					El Partido tiene la firme decision y voluntad de formar a todos los huerfanos como sucesores y grueso de la revolucion sin sentir la tristeza por no tener a sus padres ni envidiar a nadie, senalo y calculo escribiendo en la libreta cuan cantidad se necesitaria cada ano para suministrar diariamente a cada uno 300g de pescados.
					
					Es muy buena la consigna "El Ejercito Popular se encargara tanto de la defensa de la patria como de la construccion del socialismo", apunto y exhorto al EPC a encargarse del trabajo de suministrar los pescados a mencionados destinos sin perder ni un solo dia de un ano.
					
					Dio en el terreno la orden del Comandante Supremo del EPC de organizar en el EPC la empresa pesquera encargada especialmente del suministro de pescados a los lugares en  cuestion.
					
					Ordeno construir la empresa pesquera antes del Dia del Sol (15 de abril) para que se realizara el suministro de pescados desde el otono del ano en curso.
					
					Expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que este ano todos los comandantes y funcionarios capturen gran cantidad de peces.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, So Hong Chan, Pak Jong Chon, Jo Nam Jin, Hwang Pyong So y Kim Pyong Ho.

articles.title: Tienen lugar mitines de entidades de masas en respuesta al mensaje del Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Tienen lugar mitines de entidades de masas en respuesta al mensaje del Ano Nuevo
						
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 7 los mitines de los vanguardias juveniles y de los trabajadores agricolas y miembros de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea para cumplir las tareas importantes indicadas en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					Participaron en los actos el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Yong Su, los funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud Socialista, de la UTAC y otros funcionarios correspondientes, jovenes, estudiantes, trabajadores agricolas y gremiales de la UTAC. 
					
					En el acto de la juventud, efectuado en el Anfiteatro del Parque Juventud, el presidente del CC de la UJS, Jon Yong Nam, pronuncio el informe seguido de discursos. 
					
					Los oradores llamaron a todos los jovenes a manifestar el impetu heroico de las vanguardias juveniles del Songun en la valiosa lucha de este ano por realizar con antelacion los ideales y suenos hermosos del pueblo. 
					
					Enfatizaron que los jovenes de la rama agricola deben cumplir el papel vanguardista en registrar grandes innovaciones en la produccion agricola y contribuir a alcanzar este ano significativo la meta de produccion de cereales presentada por el Partido. 
					
					Expusieron la decision de construir con mas elegancia la ciudad de Pyongyang y hacer aporte a acondicionar mejor la tierra natal, las aldeas y los puestos de trabajo. 
					
					Insistieron en que los jovenes deben pasar el servicio militar y aprender bien los asuntos militares para aniquilar en un instante a los invasores y cumplir asi la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria cuando se de la orden del Comandante Supremo. 
					
					El acto de los trabajadores agricolas y los miembros de la UTAC tuvo lugar en la Granja Cooperativa de Migok de la ciudad de Sariwon. 
					
					El presidente del CC de la UTAC, Ri Myong Gil, presento el informe y hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores expusieron la decision de registrar cambios revolucionarios en la produccion agricola de este ano significativo del 50o aniversario de la publicacion de la Tesis sobre el Problema Rural Socialista, en pleno acato al noble proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Inaugurado complejo de piscinas de recreacion de Hamhung
articles.content:
Inaugurado complejo de piscinas de recreacion de Hamhung
						
Hamhung, 7 de enero (ACNC) -- Quedo construido magnificamente el complejo de piscinas de recreacion en la ciudad de Hamhung  de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					El complejo levantado en una superficie de decenas de miles de metros cuadrados a la ribera del rio Songchon, consta de torre de tobogan, varios toboganes, la piscina bajo techo, la otra de recreacion bajo techo, los establecimientos de servicio, los equipos de diversiones y las instalaciones deportivas, los cuales contribuiran a la vida cultural de los obreros, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos de la mencionada ciudad.
					
					La ceremonia de su inauguracion tuvo lugar el dia 7 con la participacion de los funcionarios de la rama concerniente, militares, constructores y voluntarios movilizados en la construccion.

articles.title: Publicada lista de 10 jugadores y entrenadores mejores de 2013
articles.content:
Publicada lista de 10 jugadores y entrenadores mejores de 2013
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ACNC) -- Fueron seleccionados en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea 10 jugadores y entrenadores mejores para el 102 (2013) de la Era Juche.
					10 jugadores mejores son los siguientes:
					
					1. Om Yun Chol (el pesista del Conjunto Deportivo Amnokgang)
					
					    Conquisto 3 medallas de oro en el campeonato de levantamiento de pesas por la copa asiatica y de clubes de los jovenes y adultos de 2013 y establecio en envion nuevo record mundial.
					
					   Obtuvo 3 medallas de oro en el campeonato asiatico de levantamiento de pesas de 2013 y 2 medallas de oro y una de plata en el campeonato mundial de levantamiento de pesas de 2013.
					
					2. Kim Jong (la tenista de mesa del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril)
					
					     Ocupo el primer lugar en el doble mixto del 52o Campeonato Mundial de Tenis de Mesa de la Federacion Mundial de Tenis de Mesa y en la misma modalidad de los 6o Juegos de Asia Oriental.
					
					3. Ryo Un Hui (la pesista del Conjunto Deportivo Kigwancha)
					
					    Obtuvo 3 medallas de oro en el campeonato asiatico de levantamiento de pesas de 2013 y 2 de plata y una de bronce en el campeonato mundial de levantamiento de pesas de 2013.
					
					4. Ryang Chun Hwa (la pesista del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril)
					
					    Conquisto 3 medallas de oro en el campeonato asiatico de levantamiento de pesas de 2013, 2 medallas de oro y una de plata en el campeonato de levantamiento de pesas por la copa asiatica y de clubes de los jovenes y adultos de 2013 y 3 medallas de plata en el campeonato mundial de levantamiento de pesas de 2013.
					
					5. Kim Hyok Bong (jugador de ping-pong del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril) 
					
					   Ocupo primer lugar en el doble mixto del 52o Campeonato Mundial de Tenis de Mesa de la Federacion Mundial de Tenis de Mesa y en la misma modalidad de los 6o Juegos de Asia Oriental.
					
					6. Ho Un Byol (futbolista del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril)
					
					Hizo aporte a la victoria del equipo coreano en el Campeonato de Futbol Femenino por la Copa Asiatica 2013 y la competencia de futbol de los 6o Juegos de Asia Oriental.
					
					7. Kim Un Guk (el pesista del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril)
					
					Gano 3 medallas de oro en el campeonato asiatico de 2013 y una de oro y una de plata en el campeonato mundial de levantamiento de pesas de 2013.
					
					8. Jo Bok Hyang (la pesista del Conjunto Deportivo Kigwancha)
					
					Conquisto 2 medallas de plata y una de bronce en el campeonato asiatico de levantamiento de pesas de 2013, 3 de oro en el campeonato de levantamiento de pesas por la copa asiatica y de clubes de los jovenes y adultos de 2013 y 3 de plata en el campeonato mundial de levantamiento de pesas de 2013.
					
					9. Yun Won Chol (luchador del estilo grecorromano del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril)
					
					   Resulto campeon en el Campeonato Mundial de Lucha 2013 y conquisto una presea de oro en el 28o Campeonato Militar Mundial de Lucha.
					
					10. Sol Kyong (judoka del Conjunto Deportivo de la Universidad de Maquinaria de Pyongyang)
					
					Ocupo el primer lugar en el Campeonato Mundial de Judo 2013.
					
					En la plantilla de 10 entrenadores mejores figuran Ro Hyon Chol (levantamiento de pesas), Kim Chun Hui (levantamiento de pesas), Kim Yong Chol (levantamiento de pesas), Choe Nong Gyun (levantamiento de pesas), Kim Chol Ung (ping-pong), Kim Kwang Min (futbol), Pak Ki Song (levantamiento de pesas), Pak Pom Su (lucha), Pak Kum Song (judo) y Kim Chun Phil (gimnasia).
